summary.description:
Today, a bit warmer for the feels like temperature (up 3.6°C) and outside temperature (up 2.8°C) and more moisture-laden rainfall (up 2.7 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1729 m), light levels (up 3007 lux), and inside temperature (up 2.2°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 143.4m lower than yesterday, 627.7m lower than the past week, 1728.8m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, cloud levels hit a low of 713m and a high of 1594m, averaging 923.6m; the past week and month reported somewhat higher averages.
cloud levels.summary: Partial cloudiness with some periods of sun.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; warm but comfortable temperatures are expected. Also, very clammy and humid and very little to no wind will be present. Some rain can be expected, partial cloudiness with some periods of sun, and sunlight will be very intense and bright. Weather could become unsettled.
